articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: See Two Meteor Showers And A ‘Planet Parade:’ The Night Sky This Week - Forbes
articles.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead (which also apply to mid-northern latitudes in the northern hemisphere).
articles.content: Geminid Meteor Shower 2020 over pond and direct road in Fred C. Babcock/Cecil M. Webb Wildlife ... More Management Area near Punta Gorda, Florida. The Geminids meteor shower is caused by the object 3… [+3439 chars]
